caption.title: Human affected areas and carbon measures over the study area.
caption.p: (A) Density of NHA (non-human-affected) area used to calculate carbon densities. (B) AGT (aboveground total woody biomass) densities derived from [ 37] for 1991–1999. (C-E) Differences in carbon densities calculated by subtracting Hudiburg’s results from simulation results for 1991–1999: (C) NF-WCE (no fire, with CO 2 fertilization effect); (D) FF-WCE (full fire, with CO 2 fertilization effect) (E) SF-WCE (stochastic fire, with CO 2 fertilization effect).
